query.name: Gene_OrthologueGO
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.name Gene.homologues.dataSets.name Gene.homologues.homologue.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.homologues.homologue.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code
query.longDescription: Show GO terms applied to Anopheles Gambiae orthologues of a specific gene. (Data Source: TreeFam, Drosophila Consortium, GO Consortium).
